description: System Telemetry Definition Manifest: Normalized definition of S6-critical performance metrics, tiered resource constraints, structured reporting templates, and mandated ingestion parameters for the Governance Telemetry Bus (GTB). Emphasizes policy mapping and standardized units.

alert_tiers.T2_CRITICAL: Requires immediate autonomous intervention (S6 Protocol C)
alert_tiers.T1_WARNING: Requires autonomous assessment and soft mitigation (S6 Protocol W)

units.GFLOPS: Giga Floating Point Operations Per Second

protocol_index.RRP_C_C-B_101: Resource Reaction Protocol: Compute Usage Critical Tier B
protocol_index.RRP_W_M-A_102: Resource Reaction Protocol: Memory Usage Warning Tier A
protocol_index.RRP_C_M-B_102: Resource Reaction Protocol: Memory Usage Critical Tier B
protocol_index.RVP_RT-LATENCY_900: Required Validation Policy: Real-Time Kernel Latency Constraint
protocol_index.RVP_CRYPTO_501: Required Validation Policy: Cryptographic Throughput Degradation
protocol_index.RVP_GOVERNANCE_302: Required Validation Policy: Policy Evaluation Time Exceeded
